data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The children are playing ball outside on the street. They ____ every ____ in ____ summer ____ play ____, ____ the ____ is ____ and ____ is ____ rain. Tonight, they ____ playing ____. Their parents are watching from their houses.
data.partBlankContent: The children are playing ball outside on the street. They me__ every ni___ in t__ summer t_ play toge____, wh__ the wea____ is wa__ and th___ is n_ rain. Tonight, they a__ playing base____. Their parents are watching from their houses.
data.answer: 孩子们正在外面的街上玩球。夏天的晚上，天气暖和，不下雨的时候，他们每天晚上都聚在一起玩耍。今晚，他们在打棒球。他们的父母在家里看着他们。
